And the sign of it is when it is due to a section of the caphac, for at the beginning it causes sudden severe pain; and it appears as an abscess different from one near the navel, and this is because of the protrusion of the bowel, and its body outside beyond the caphac.
E alcunas veguadas es fora-getat am le budel la tela, e es apelada aquesta hernia entestinal zirbal.	In some cases, the membrane is separated from the bowel, and this type of intestinal hernia is called zirbal.
E alcunas veguadas es fayta am ventositat, e alcunas veguadas corr en le budel fenda, e aqui es retenguda, e es am aquo gran pernitia3 del malaute, e alcunas veguadas fa endevenir dolor malvada e majorment quan es premut.	In some cases, hernias are caused by gas, and in other cases they follow the path of a bowel fissure where they are trapped, causing great pain to the patient, and often cause severe discomfort especially when pressed.
E en la curacio de las especias de aquesta malautia am ferr es temor, per que cove que sia esquivat le cazament en aquela.	And in the treatment of this type of illness with iron, there is fear, because it is advisable to avoid its use in such cases.
E la manieyra de la operacio de aquela es que comandes al malaute que redugua le budel am la sua ma a las partidas dedintz de la sua conquavitat si obezeys al sieu retornament, e aprop sia envessat sobre le sieu col entre las tuas mas, e eleva las cambas de lu.	The method of the operation for this condition is to instruct the patient to push the bowel back into its place with their hand inside the affected area. If it obeys and returns to its proper position, then lay the patient on their back and raise their legs.
E aprop sten la codena la qual siec la codena dels testicols a las partidas desus, e inscideys la codena dels testicols tota per le lonc; e aprop fiqua en doas labias de la seccio uncis segon que indigeysses a hubrir la seccio am aquels.	Then apply a ligature to the cord that connects the testicles, and incise the cord of the testicles along its entire length; then place hooks in both sides of the section as needed to keep it open.
E si’ la seccio segon la quantitat que a tu sia possible que de aquela le huou sia foro-getat.	And if the section, according to the quantity that is possible for you, is separated from it as much as necessary.
E aprop excorja aquela ciphaqueth les quals so dejos la codena dels testicols, entro que sia descubert le ciphac blanc dur de quascuna partida.	Then carefully remove the tissue around the cord of the testicles until the white hard structure on each side is exposed.
Lahoras tu entromet le tieu dit en aquo que siec le testicol, en aquo que es entre ciphac blanc, le qual es dejos la codena del huou, e entre le ciphac segon, e absolve am aquel’adherencia que es en la partida detras del huou.	Now insert your finger into the area where the testicle is located, between the white structure that is behind the cord, and between the adjacent structures, to loosen any adhesions in the area behind the testicle.
E aprop mau am la ma la codena dels testicols a las partidas deforo, e am aysso exten le ciphac blanc en sus am la ma sinestra, e eleva le huou am le ciphac a la partida de la seccio; e comanda al ministre que extenda le huou ensus e tu dissolveys la adherencia que es detras am solucio complida.	From the side of the testicles towards the parts behind, and with this extend the white thread on top to the left hand, and raise the wound above the thread at the part of the section; and command the assistant to extend it upwards while you dissolve the adherence that is behind upon completion of the solution.
E cerqua am les tieus ditz que lay no sia alcuna causa del budel envelopat en le ciphac blanc dur.	And search among those things to ensure that there is no cause of the intestine wrapped around the white thread hard.
Mays si tu atrobas de lu alcuna causa, lahoras tu enpelleys aquel al ventre dejos.	But if you find any cause for concern, then you should push that back into the lower abdomen.
E aprop tu pren una agulha en la qual sia fiel gros fayt de x fiels, e entromet aquel deves le derier del ciphac, le qual es jos la codena dels testicols, la qual siec seccio; e aprop inscideys las extremitatz las quals emineysso del fiel entro que sian quatre fiels, e aprop compausa alcus de lor sobre alcuna figura en manieyra de crotz; e lia am aquel le ciphac del qual havem dit que es dejos la codena dels testicols am fort liament de dos partz.	And then take a needle with seven thick threads, and insert it at the end of the white thread which is below the testicles, where the section is; and then cut off the parts that protrude beyond the needle so that there are only four threads remaining, and then arrange some of them in the shape of a cross; and tie those threads to the white thread we have mentioned as being below the testicles firmly from both sides.
E aprop envolveys las extremitatz dels fiels e lia aquelas am liament vehement entro que alcu dels vayssels que noyrrisso aquels no puscan trametre alcuna causa per so que de aqui no accida apostema caut.	And then wrap the ends of the threads and tie them firmly so that none of the vessels nourishing those parts can transmit any cause for harm, thereby preventing an abscess from occurring.
E pausa autra veguada liament segon foro le primier liament, lonh de lu mens tres ditz; e aprop aquestz dos liaments layssa del ciphac le qual es dejos la codena dels testicols la quantitat de la grandeza del dit, e inscideys tot le romanent segon redondeza, e osta de lu le huou.	And make another tie at a distance of three such lengths from the first tie; and then leave on the white thread that is below the testicles the length equivalent to the size of a finger, and cut off the rest in a round manner, and remove the wound.
E aprop inscideys en la partida dejos de la codena dels testicols per seccio de la qual corra sanc e sania ayssi cum havem recomtat en aquo que havem dit.	And then incise in the part below the testicles at a section from which blood and pus flow as we have described in what has been said.
E aprop aministra lana submersa en oli, e pausa en la plagua; e aministra le liament le qual havem recomtat (e alcunas veguadas le ciphac blanc es cauterizat, le qual havem dit aprop la inscizio de lu temen de flux de sanc, quar motas veguadas accideys aquels) e leyssa le liament entro que per si caia.	Take the lint soaked in oil and apply it to the wound; then apply the bandage we have recommended (and some poultices made with white cerate are cauterized, as we mentioned concerning the incision of pus, since sometimes such accidents happen) and leave the bandage on until it falls off by itself.
Mays si le cazement de lu es tardat, lahoras de aygua cauda sia embrocat, e pausa sobre aquel entro que caia segon que havem dit.	If the cleaning of it is delayed, hot water should be applied and placed over it until it falls off as we have said.
E aprop cura la plagua am l’autra curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanat.	And regarding the treatment of the wound, follow the other methods for treating wounds until it is healed.
Capitol .lxvi.	Chapter LXVI.
De hernia ventosa.	On Ventral Hernia.
En aquesta hernia no e vist alcu que sia estat ardit sus la curacio de lu am ferr.	In this type of hernia, it has not been seen that anyone has dared to treat it with surgery.
E les primiers diyssero que es fayta ayssi cum havem recomtat en la hernia que es am vi; la qual es que tu lies les vayssels aprop la seccio sobre aquela am fecilitat de lu; e aprop secca en le mieg loc en enviro le apostema am aquo que obro aquel, entro que caian les vayssels.	And the earlier practitioners said that it should be treated as we have recommended for hernias involving the intestines; which is to ligate the vessels near the section where there is ease in doing so; and then dry up the swelling in the nearby area with something that will cause it to drain, until the vessels fall off.
E cura la plagua segon que havem dit entro que sia sanada.	And treat the wound as we have said until it is healed.
Capitol .lxvii.	Chapter LXVII.
De la disropcio que es fayta en les anguonars.	On the Incision Made in Hernias.
Alcunas veguadas endeve ruptura en les angonars ayssi cum havem dit, e emineys le loc.	Sometimes there is a rupture in the hernia as we have said, and it becomes evident in that location.
E no deyssen als genetius alcuna causa dels budels al genetius; e si deyssen, aquo es pauc; e retorna s’en en totas horas.	And they do not assign any specific cause for the sac in hernia cases; and even if they do, it is rare; and it returns at all times.
Mays si es prolonguat le temps am aquo, es ajustada fissura en le ciphac entro que deysenda le budel en le ciphac; e accideys aquo per la extencio del ciphac le qual es en le angonars ayssi cum havem dit, la qual causa es quar le ciphac es estendut, e aprop es mollificat e·l loc es apostemat e emineys.	If the time is prolonged with it, adjust the fissure in the sphincter within which descends the bowel into the sphincter; and this happens due to the extension of the sphincter, as we have said, which is in the angles, because the sphincter is stretched out, and accordingly it becomes soft and there is swelling.
E la cura de lu es am cauteri ayssi quo es precedida la narracio de lu.	And the treatment for it is with cautery as was preceded in the narrative.
E alcunas veguadas es curada am ferr segon aquesta manieyra: e es que·l malaute jagua sobre le sieu dos entre las tuas mas, e aprop secca le loc de la ruptura dels apostemas emineys am seccio per la latitut segon la quantitat de tres ditz.	And sometimes it is cured with iron according to this method: the patient lies on their back between the thighs, and then the area of the swollen abscess rupture is dried with section across its width according to the measure of three fingers.
E aprop strenh le ciphac blanc que es jos la codena entro que sia descubert.	And then stretch the white sphincter that is below the rib so that it becomes uncovered.
E aprop pren le ray e pausa aquel sobre le loc eminent del ciphac, e prem aquel al preon del ventre.	And then take the cautery and place it on the prominent part of the sphincter, and press it to the pain in the abdomen.
E aprop cus le dos locs eminentz sobre la extremitat del ray del ciphac, e ajusta am la sutura un de aquels am l’autre.	And then cut the two prominent parts above the tip of the sphincter, and join them with sutures one to the other.
E aprop extratz la extremitat del ray, e no inscidas del ciphac de tot, ni no extenda le huou, ni autra causa ayssi cum yeu te fi saber en la curacio de hernia entestinal.	And then extract the tip of the sphincter, and do not cut it completely from the sphincter, nor extend the tissue, nor any other cause such as I will explain to you in the treatment of intestinal hernia.
E aprop cura aquela am la curacio de las plaguas, e cum inscideyses les fiels, mundifica aquela e restaura la plagua entro que sia consolidada; quar le ciphac es contrayt e no es ajustada la eminencia de ruptura.	And then treat it as you would a wound, and when you incise the abscesses, clean it and restore the wound until it is healed; for the sphincter is contracted and the swelling of rupture is not adjusted.
E cauteri es milhor en aquest loc, quar es pus propda a salut.	And cautery is better in this case, for it is closer to healing.
Capitol .lxviii.	Chapter LXVIII.
De mollificacio de la codena dels testiculs.	On the Softening of the Cord of the Testicles.
Motas veguadas la codena dels testiculs en alcus homes es mollificada per aysso quar las carns que so entre aquela son mollificadas, e es fedat le reguardament de lu.	In many cases, the cord of the testicles is softened because the flesh within it is also softened, and this requires careful management.
Adonc necessari es ad aquel que es preguat en la curacio de lu que fassa jazer le malaute segon le sieu dos, e enscida tota la codena la qual es mollificada sobre la codena natural; e aprop que ajuste doas labias am la sutura.	Therefore, it is necessary for the one seeking its cure to lay the patient according to his position, and then raise the entire cord that is softened above the natural cord; and then adjust two edges with sutures.
E si vols, cus en le comensament la superfluitat de la codena mollificada am tres cozeduras o quatre e am ferma sutura.	And if you wish, in the beginning, remove the excess of the softened cord with three or four stitches and secure it firmly with sutures.
E aprop inscideys entre las suturas; e aprop cura per curacio de las autras plaguas entro que sia sanat e caian les fiels.	Then incise between the sutures; and subsequently treat for other injuries until he is healed and the pus has subsided.
Capitol .lxix.	Chapter LXIX.
De castracio.	On Castration.
Sapias que castratio en nostre ley es excomengada, mays per causa es legut a mi que·m remembre de lu en aquest libre; e no es necessaria la rememoracio de lu sino per doas manieyras, de las quals es la una per so que aquo sia en la sciensa del metge quan es enterroguat de aquela, que sapia la curacio de lu al qual accideys; e l’autra manieyra es que nos motas vetz havem necessitat de castracio de autras bestias per les juvamentz nostres per aquelas, ayssi cum de motos, e de bocs, e de porcs, e de semblantz a las bestias.	Know that castration in our law is excommunicated, yet for certain reasons it has been read to me and I remember it in this book; and the remembrance of it is not necessary except in two ways: one being so that when asked about it, the physician knows how to cure those who suffer from it; and the other way is that we often have a need for castration in other animals for our benefit, such as horses, oxen, pigs, and similar beasts.
E donc dic que castracio es fayta en dos manieyras: o per atrissio, o per fissura a seccio.	And therefore, I say that castration is performed in two ways: either by crushing or by cutting.
Mays en aquela que es fayta per atrissio, la via de la opera es que nos fassam cezer la bestia en aygua cauda entro que·ls genetius de lu sian mollificatz e sian linhitz e que pendan.	In the case of that which is done by incision, the way to proceed is that we should cut the animal in warm water until its genitals are softened and loosened and hang down.
E aprop pren aquels am la tua ma entro que sian resols e no apparescan dejos le tocament.	And then take those with your hand inside until they are relaxed and do not appear below the touch.
Mays en castracio fayta per fissura e seccio, cove que tu tenguas la bestia e premas la codena dels testicols de lu am la ma senestra.	In the case of castration done by rupture and section, make sure you hold the animal and press the root of its testicles with your left hand.
E aprop lia le suspensori, e inscideys sobre quascun huou am una seccio entro que dos huous proceseysso.	And then grasp the suspensory ligaments, and incise each one with a section until two processes are carried out.
E aprop inscideys aquels pus que auras quascu excorjat.	And then incise those parts that you have each peeled back.
E no leysses sobre aquels del ciphac alcuna causa, sino le ciphac subtil le qual es sobre les vazes.	And do not leave on those of the spermatic cord any cause for harm, but rather the fine cord that is over the vessels.
E aquesta manieyra de castracio es milhor la qual es fayta per atrissio, quar atrissio fort leu layssa alcuna causa dels testicols per que la bestia desira coyt.	And this method of castration is better than the one done by incision, because incision often leaves some cause from the testicles for which the animal desires to copulate.
E aprop cura la plagua entro que sia sanada.	And then take care of the wound until it is healed.
Capitol .lxx.	Chapter 70.
De la cura de hermafrodozia.	On the treatment of hermaphroditism.
Hermafrodozia en les homes es segon dos manieyras: la una es quar o appar en aquo que siec l’espazi en la codena de testiculs, en aquel que es entre dos testiculs figura quar cunh de femna en la qual so pels.	Hermaphroditism in men occurs in two ways: one is when it appears in the space between the root of the testicles, in the area between two testicles where there is a figure resembling that of a female, including hair.
E alcunas veguadas de aquel corr urina le qual es en la codena dels testiculs.	In some cases of that vein which carries urine from which is in the cord of the testicles.
Mays en las femnas es una specia: e es que·l conh de la femna sobre le pentenilh es ayssi cum dos testiculs de home un pauc de tot yminiheys a la partida deforo ayssi cum le perpucii de home e dos testicols.	In women there is a special case: the womb of a woman above the pubis is like two testicles of a man, a little more towards the inside just as the buttocks of a man and two testicles.
E la curacio es de tres specias: de dos dels homes e de una specia de las femnas.	The treatment is of three kinds: two for men and one kind for women.
E es que cove que tu inscidas aquelas carns ajustadas entro que efuga la emprecio de aquela, e aprop que cures aquelas am curacio de las autras plaguas.	It is that you should incise those tight tissues so that the pus escapes from it, and then treat it as you would other wounds.
E en la segonda specia dels homes de la qual yeys urina la qual es en la codena dels testiculs, no es curacio ni opperacio en lu.	And in the second kind for men, of which you have urine that is in the cord of the testicles, there is no treatment or operation for it.
Capitol .xxi.	Chapter XXI.
De lentinge e de carn eminent per causas de las femnas.	About hemorrhoids and protruding flesh due to causes in women.
Lentige fort leu es ajustada sobre causas naturals entro que es etressat e es fayt leg le reguardament; e alcunas veguadas es magnificada en alcunas femnas en tant entro que es spandit ayssi cum en les homes e perve entro al coito.	Severe hemorrhoids are tightly attached due to natural causes, making it difficult to treat and requiring careful management; in some cases, they become enlarged in women to such an extent that they prolapse similarly to men's and cause issues during intercourse.
Adonc cove que tu tenguas la superfluitat de lentinge am la tua ma o am unci e inscidas.	Then you should grasp the excess of hemorrhoid with your hand or with forceps and incise it.
E no ultimes en inscizio, majorment en le preon de la razit, per so que no endevengua flux de sanc.	And do not incise excessively, especially near the root, so that it does not cause bleeding.
E aprop cura aquela am curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanada.	And then treat it as you would other wounds until it is healed.
Mays carn nascuda es carn que nays en le horrifici de la mayre entro que umple aquel, e fort leu es eyssit a las partidas deforo segon semblansa de coa (e per aquo alscus primiers appelero aquo “malautia caudada”); donc cove que nos inscidam ayssi cum inscidem lentinge, e curem aquela entro que sia sanada.	This flesh that emerges is the flesh born in the cavity of the major part within which it fills, and it easily spreads to the parts outside according to the appearance of a tail (and thus I first called this "tail illness"); therefore, we must cut it as we would with an intestine, and treat what lies inside until it be healed.
Capitol .lxxii.	Chapter LXXII.
De curacio de alratica.	On the Treatment of Abscesses.
Alratica es que le conh de la femna no sia perforat, o sia le trauc petit.	Abscess is what occurs when the female organ is not perforated or the passage is small.
E es o natural o accidental.	And it can be either natural or accidental.
Accidental es per malautia la qual ha precedit, e aquela es fayta o per carn nada ajustada o per ciphac subtil o espes.	It is accidental due to a previous illness, and that is caused either by flesh that is too tight or by a thin or thick obstruction.
E es fayt o en le preon de la mayre, o en les costatz de lu, o en le pus sobira de lu, o en le pus bas de lu, e prohibeys de cuoyt e de enprenguacio e de enfantament, e fort leu prohibeys las mestruas.	It occurs either in the front part of the major organ, or on its sides, or in the upper part of it, or in the lower part, and it prohibits intercourse, conception, and childbirth, and also easily prevents menstruation.
E la cognicio de aquela es fayta per reguardament de la metrona, si la oppilacio es apparent, propdana; mays si no es apparent, lahoras tu cerqua aquela am les tieus ditz o am le ray.	And the diagnosis of that condition is made by examination with a speculum, if the obstruction is apparent, proceed immediately; but if it is not apparent, then inquire about it through your questions or with an instrument.
Mays si oppilacio es per ciphac subtil, e es propda a las doas labias, lahoras tu coyta e disromp aquela.	But if the obstruction is due to a thin membrane and it is located between the two lips, then you should examine and rupture that.
E es que pauses sobre las doas labias pulvils, e aprop pausa les tieus ditz indicz de amdoas las mas encemps.	And you should place pillows on both lips, and then gently place your fingers between them to examine.
E la femna sia sobre le sieu dos, las sieuas coyssas extendudas, e aprop exten las doas labias am forsa entro que aquel ciphac subtil sia romput e la oppilacio sia uberta.	And the woman should lie on her back, with her legs spread apart, and then gently spread the two lips to rupture that thin membrane and open the obstruction.
E aprop pren lana e enbeu le4 en oli e pausa aquela sobre·l loc, e jagua am home le dia per so que·l loc inscis no sia consolidat.	Take then the bandage and immerse it in oil and place that over the area, and change it daily so that the incised area does not become consolidated.
Mays si le ciphac es gros e espes, lahoras cove que tu inscidas aquel am spatum lat o am fuelha de mirta.	If the swelling is large and thick, now you should incise it with a scalpel or with a myrtle leaf.
Mays si la oppilacio es per carnada, lahoras suspen aquela am unci, e inscideys aquela.	If the obstruction is due to food, now suspend it for an hour, and then incise it.
E sian am tu las medicinas que fan cessar flux de sanc ses mordicacio, ayssi cum ahacatia, e sanc de drago, e enses, ajustat am album de huou.	And use the medicines that stop blood flow from a bite, such as hystiatia, dragon's blood, and onions, mixed with egg white.
E aprop aministra una canulha de plom ampla per so que la plagua no sia consolidada leugierament.	Then administer a lead tube that is wide so that the wound does not consolidate too quickly.
E tengua aquela per alcus jorns e aministra calgua de li sec.	And keep that for several days and administer dry heat to it.
E aprop sia curada am l’autra curacio de consolidacio entro que sia sanada.	And then treat it with the other method of consolidation until it is healed.
E alcunas vetz accideys en la mayre nativitat de autres carns, e lahoras cove que inscidas segon aquesta manieyra.	And sometimes it happens in the larger birth of other tissues, and now you should incise according to this method.
Mays si aysso es per apostema crancos, a l’apostema crancos le qual es en la mayre no sia fayta contrarietat am ferr en deguna manieyra.	But if it is due to a chronic abscess, then with the chronic abscess that is in the larger area, do not make any opposition with iron in any way.
Capitol .lxxiii.	Chapter LXXIII.
De la cura de emorroydas e de tayl e de botor roja que accideysso en le conh de las femnas.	On the treatment of hemorrhoids and similar conditions that occur in the anus of women.
Emorroydas so apprecio dels orificis de motas venas entro que de aquelas corro mot sanc continuadament; e cum so antiquadas emorroydas e son fayts theyls.	Hemorrhoids are an appreciation of the openings of small veins from which blood flows continuously; and as for old hemorrhoids, they form tumors.
E ja yeu he dit en la divisio las specias de aquelas e les senhals de aquelas, e diyre ayssi aquelas que recebo curacio e aquelas que no recebo curacio.	Here I have said in the division of the species of those and the signs of those, and to say also those that receive cure and those that do not receive cure.
Donc dic que emorroydas e theyls quan so en le preon de la mayre e no apparo al sentiment, lahoras en aquelas no sia fayta curacio am ferr.	Therefore, I say that hemorrhoids and piles which are only in the region of the greater and do not appear to the touch, at this time it is not possible to perform cure with iron.
Mays aquelas las quals so en le orrifici de la mayre sobre las quals catz sentiment, so aquelas que so curadas.	But those which are in the opening of the anus, on which one can feel by touch, these are those that can be treated.
E cove que tu metas la femna en mayso frega e aprop exten atheyl am les forfexs, o am drap aspre, e inscideys aquelas am las razitz.	And it is necessary that you place the woman in a sitting position to wash and then extend the hemorrhoid with forceps, or with a rough cloth, and incise those with razors.
E aprop pulveriza sobre aquelas deves le fluxs del sanc de una de las polveras insciscivas ses mordicacio, ayssi cum acassia e semblant ad aquels.	And then powder should be applied to those areas that stop the flow of blood from one of the powdered substances used for incisions without chewing, such as acacia and similar ones.
E aprop enpellesca les sieus pes per una hora, e aprop pausa aquela en aygua freja.	And then bind the area with a dressing for one hour, and afterward place it in cold water.
E si persevera le fluxs del sanc, lahoras fay aquela sezer en decoccio de sumat e de scorsas de milgranas e de gualas e de semblantz.	And if the flow of blood persists, then have the area treated with a decoction of sumac and rind of lemons and gallnuts and similar substances.
E aprop pren farina de ordi e comfiys aquela am miel e vi agre e fay emplastre am aquo sobre le dos de lu.	And then take flour of barley and apply it with honey and sour wine to make a plaster on the back of it.
E si le sanc es abscindit, bo es; e sino, fay adherir am dos ventozas, e a las mamilhas ses escarificatio.	And if the blood is congealed, that is good; and if not, apply it to two sides, and at the nipples without incision.
E aprop pren lana e submergeys aquela am suc de coliandre o am suc de arnagloza o am suc de guarravier am vi pentit e fay adherir al loc; e aprop cura le loc am enguentz entro que sia sanat.	And then take wool and apply it to the area with juice of cilantro or juice of anise or juice of wild parsnip in sour wine, and attach it to the location; and afterward treat the place with ointments until it is healed.
Mays athyl rog le qual es de aspre reguardament, cove que tu inscidas aquo que a tu appar de aquel segon que he dit en theyl engualment.	May this be of some help to you in regard to rough treatment, so that you insert what appears suitable to your view according to what I have said about it equally.
E cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	And cure him so that he may be healed.
Capitol .lxxiv.	Chapter LXXIV.
De perforacio de eyssedura accident en la mayre.	On the Incision of the Bladder in Accidental Cases Affecting the Belly.
Motas specias de apostemas accideysso en la mayre, ayssi cum cranc e apostema lapident e ulceracios e adhubelat e erpetromens e fistulas emorroyas e raguarrias e thyl e autres apostemas.	Various kinds of abscesses occur in this area, such as gangrenous, lithic, ulcerative, hemorrhagic, phlegmonous, herpetic, fistulous, hemorrhoids, rectal abscesses, and other abscesses.
E yeu ja he dit aquestas malautias e las specias de aquelas e les senhals de aquelas, e las curacios de lor en la divisio.	And I have already discussed these illnesses and their kinds, the signs of them, and their treatments in detail.
E cove que yeu digua en aquest tractat de apostema caut le qual ve en la mayre quan es dels apostemas que collegeysso sania, e si vols saber en qual manieyra se fa la opperacio de lu am ferr.	And what I say in this treatise about abscesses that occur in the belly when they are among those that can be cured, and if you want to know how the operation is performed.
Adonc cove que tu consideres si la dolor de la apostema en le sieu comensament es aguda am percussio e flecma e febre, e vezes aquel enrogezir e si catz sobre aquel le sentiment, lahoras no·t coytes am perforacio de lu, e cura aquel am aquo que ajuda sobre la maturacio entro que cesse la acuitat dels accidentz.	Then you must consider whether the pain of the abscess at its beginning is acute with percussion and phlegm and fever, and if there is redness and sensitivity in that area, do not perform an incision then, but treat it to aid maturation until the acuity of the symptoms subsides.
E lahoras cove que tu fassas cezer la femna sobre una cezelha que aia doas cezelhas; e recline sobre le sieu dos e ajusta les sieus pes a la partida pus dejos del ventre, e las sieus coyssas sian expandudas, e pausa les sieus brasses dejos les sieus denols, e lia quascus am liament ad aquo convenient.	And now you should have the woman lie on a bench with two legs; let her recline on her back and place her feet at the part below the abdomen, and spread out her arms below her elbows, and bind them with bandages as is appropriate.
E aprop la matrona segua del latz dreyt e aministre le instrument am le qual es ubert le orrifici de la mayre, la forma del qual vindra en aquelas causas que·s faran aprop.	Follow the midwife with the right hand and administer the instrument with which to open the largest opening, the form of which will be made clear in the cases that will follow.
E cove quan vols ministrar aquest instrument que tu fiques am lo ray le preon de la mayre de la femna, e aquo que del instrument es intrat en la mayre no sia mays que·l preon de la mayre e leda le malaute.	And when you want to administer this instrument, place it along the axis of the largest part of the woman's body, and ensure that what enters from the instrument into the largest opening does not exceed the size of the largest part and lead to injury.
Mays si l’estrument es major que·l preon de la mayre, lahoras cove que tu pauses pulvils sobre la textura del preon de la mayre per sso que sia prohibit l’intrament de tot instrument en le preon de la mayre.	If the instrument is larger than the opening of the largest part, then at that time you should apply poultices to the tissue around the largest opening so that it becomes impossible to introduce any instrument into the largest opening.
E cove que tu pauses le vertitge que corr en le strument del latz pus desus e que le ministre tengua le strument e revolva le vertitge entro que sia ubert le orrifici de la mayre.	And you should place the spiral that runs along the handle of the instrument above your hand, and have the minister hold the instrument while rotating the spiral so that it opens the largest opening.
E cum appar la excitura, e es tocada am la ma e es leon e molh, lahoras cove que tu secces aquela deves le cap de lu am spatum lat.	And when the wound appears and is touched by the hand and feels hot and moist, then at that time you should dry it with a piece of linen.
E cum la sania es evacuada, lahoras cove que tu pauses en la plagua una meca submersa en oli rozat o oli vert en le qual sia alcuna stiptisitat; e pausa la calca7 en la seccio en le preon de la mayre.	And when the pus is evacuated, then you should place on the wound a piece of cloth submerged in olive oil or green oil, which has some astringent properties; and apply a bandage around the largest opening.
E pause deforo la mayre e sobre le pentenilh lana munda submersa en aygua en la qual sian bulidas malvas.	And place clean wool over the largest opening and on top of it, place linen soaked in water in which mallows have been boiled.
E aprop sia curada aprop dos dias am enguent le qual conveneys ad aquo entro que sia sanat.	And it should be treated for about two days with the remedy that you consider appropriate until it is healed.
E alcunas veguadas es lavada la mayre e la plagua enayssi que es cristerisat am aygua e mel, e aprop am aygua en la qual es bulhida razit de liri o de aristologia longua, e aprop retorna al enguent.	And in some cases, the largest opening and the wound should be washed with this so that it is cleansed with water and honey, and then with water in which rue or long-leaved artemisia has been boiled, and afterward return to the remedy.
E si la plagua es dedintz en la mayre ameguada, lahoras cove que tu sias prohibit de la curacio de lu am ferr, habantz cura aquel am aquo que havem dit en la divisio.	And if the wound is inside the large cavity, then you must be prohibited from treating it with iron, but take care of that limb as we have said in the division.
Capitol .lxxv.	Chapter LXXV.
A ensenhar las matronas en qual manieyre les enbrios bius sian medicatz quan yeysso segon figura no-natural.	To instruct midwives on how to treat male embryos in cases where there is an unnatural swelling as shown in the figure.
Necessaria causa es que la matrona conogua en le comensament la figura del enfantament natural per senhals de lu, e es que quan tu vezas la femna expremar a las partidas dejos e desira odorar le ayre, e sobre aquo es enleujada per aquo que sobre ela es del part, e festina le eyssiment del enbrio, lahoras sapias que aquest part es segon figura natural, e es l’eyssiment de lu sobre le sieu cap, e la segondina am aquel o suspensa o pendent del ombelic.	It is necessary that the midwife knows at the beginning the figure of normal childbirth by its signs. And it is when you see the woman push down and desire to smell the air, and she is encouraged by what is above her during labor; then you know that this birth is according to a natural figure, and the delivery is over the head of the child, and the second part is either suspended or hanging from the navel.
Donc cum tu vezes aquels senhals, lahoras cove que·l ventre de lu sia compremut per so que l’embrio deysenda leugerament quar quan deyssen sobre le sieu cap, deysen a lu la segondina, e es mondada de aquelas superfluitatz am bona mondificacio.	When you see those signs, then it is necessary to compress the abdomen so that the embryo descends gently, for when it delivers over its head, the second part will be delivered, and it should be cleaned of those superfluities with proper cleansing.
Mays aquel que es otra aquest part es no-natural e no-lausable, quar quan le enbrio es eyssit sobre sos pes e·l cos de lu es eyssit devant le cap de lu e·ls pes de lu, e la ma de lu una, o al pe de lu i, o es eyssit le cap de lu e la ma de lu, o al ventre de lu, e fort leu es convertit sobre le sieu col, e semblant de las figuras de lu no-lausablas.	But if it is another kind of delivery, it is unnatural and not commendable, for when the embryo is delivered on its back and the body of the child is delivered in front of its head and behind its feet, with one hand or foot exposed first, or the head and a hand or foot turned to the side, or the belly facing forward, and easily turns around its neck, resembling the figures of those that are not commendable.
Don necessaria causa es a la matrona que sia savia e subtil en totas aquelas causas, e que·s guarde de error e de decepcio.	Therefore, it is necessary for the midwife to be wise and subtle in all these matters and to guard against error and deception.
E yeu so mostrant tota figura de aquelas, e qual engen es en aquelas per so que sia significat per aquo e sia stat sobre aquo.	Here is the translation:
Quan le feyt es eyssit sobre le sieu cap per egrecio natural, e aquel es vehement sobre la femna e es fayt a lu part dificil, e vezes la vertut de lu ja debelitada, lahoras fay aquela sezer , o que las femnas tenguan lu, e evapora le conh de lu am fenugrec coyt e am olis humitz.	When the fetus is set upon the woman's head naturally, and it is strongly positioned on the woman and the birth is difficult in that place, and sometimes the strength of the womb has been weakened, then at this time one should cause her to expel it or allow her to have it, and evaporate the essence of fenugreek juice with warm oil.
E aprop entrometa la metrona entre les sieus ditz espatum petit e fenda am aquel la segondina, o secce aquela am la sua ungla entro que corro aquo que es en ela de humiditat.	And then insert the midwife's hand between those parts called the buttocks, and separate with the second finger, or dry it with her fingernail so that she can feel what is inside in terms of humidity.
E preme le ventre de la femna entro que deyssenda le fet.	And press the woman's belly so that the fetus descends.
Mays si no deyssen, lahoras cove que la femna sia cristirizada de mucellage de ptilli e mucellage de fenugrec am cizami.	But if it does not descend, then at this time the woman should be anointed with powder of cyperus and powder of fenugreek with eggs.
E aprop comanda a lu, aprop le cristeri, que sia compremuda e fay aquela stornudar am condisi; e te la boca de lu e·l nas de lu per huna hora, quar le fet sira foro-getat tantost.	And then command her, after the anointment, to be made to sneeze with appropriate conditions; and do this at her mouth and nose for one hour, because the fetus will be expelled shortly.
E si las doas mas del fet so foro-getadas al comensament, lahoras cove que tu redusiscas aquelas am fecilitat petit a petit.	And if both sides of the fetus are expelled at the beginning, then it is necessary to reduce them to ease gradually.
Mays si no obezeys al intrament, lahoras pausa la femna sobre una cezelha e leva les pes de lu sus, e aprop concuceys la cezelha sobre la terra; e la femna sia tenguda que no caia deves la concussio.	But if it does not obey the instrument, then place the woman on a cushion and raise her legs up, and then strike the cushion on the ground; and hold the woman so that she does not fall due to the impact.
E si las mas no son dedintz tornadas e morr le fet, lahoras inscideys aquelas e extratz le romament del fet o lia le cors a la ma de lu am drap e extratz aquel am equalitat, quar aquel sira foro-getat.	And if the membranes are not returned and the fetus dies, then incise them and extract the remnants of the fetus or tie the body to your hand with a cloth and extract it gently, as it will be expelled.
De eyssiment del embrio sobre les sieus pes.	Of the incision of the embryo upon its sides.
Quan le fet yeys sobre les sieus pes, lahoras cove que tu impelliscas aquels en sus, e aprop convertas le fet petit, e aprop que engualhes aquel, e aprop que prenguas un pe de lu e extendas aquels petit a petit.	When the fetus is cut on its sides, then you should push them up, and immediately turn the fetus slightly, and then even it out, and then take a piece of it and extend them little by little.
Mays cum son eyssit entro a las coyssas, lahoras tu comanda a lu que se exprema, e fay aquela extornudar am condizi, quar sira foro-getat si Deus lo vol.	But when it is cut into the contents, then you command him to sneeze, and make that person sneeze under certain conditions, for it will be expelled if God wills it.
E si no es foro-getat am aquo que havem recomtat, lahoras tu retorna le fet petit a petit entro que pauses aquel segon figura natural, quar aquel sira lahoras foro-getat am leugier eyssiment.	And if it is not expelled with what we have recommended, then you return the fetus little by little until you place it in its second natural position, for it will be expelled at that time with a simple incision.
E si es prohibit am tot aquo que havem recomtat, lahoras pren de musellage de altea e de goma dissolvuda, e percuteys tot en le mortier per bona percussio, e aprop linieys am aquo le conh de la femna, el pus bas del ventre de lu.	And if it is prevented by everything we have recommended, then take musellage of hartshorn and dissolved gum, and triturate all in the mortar with good pounding, and then apply that mixture to the woman's cervix, at the bottom of her abdomen.
E aprop fay aquela cezer en aygua tebeza, entro que consegua les ypocondias.	And then make that person sit in warm water, until the hypochondria are reached.
E cum vezes que las partidas dejos de lu so lenificadas, lahoras fay a lu subfumiguacio de mirta e sub-pausa aquela a lu.	And when the lower parts of him are cleansed, then perform the fumigation of myrtle and apply that to him.
E quan te la sub-fumiguacio per una hora, lahoras tu la fay sezer sobre una cezelha, e aprop fay aquela stornudar e extrenh la boca de lu, e levas de aquela, e prem la partida pus bassa del ventre de lu am leugiera compressio, quar le fet sira tantost foro-getat.	And when the sub-fumigation has been performed for one hour, then make him sit on a chair, and then make that person sneeze and expel the mouth of him, and take him away, and press the lower part of his abdomen gently, for the fetus will be expelled soon.
Eyssiment del fet sobre les sieus denols e las suas mas.	Incision of the fetus on its sides and its thighs.
Quan le fet eyssira segon aquesta forma, lahoras tu engenies en entrometen las suas mas petit a petit; e aprop la femna stia evessada sobre le sieu col, e les pes de lu pengo en jos, e aquelas sia jasent sobre le lieyt, e complegua las suas mas.	When the fetus is discharged in this form, then you devise to insert its smaller parts gradually; and let the woman be placed lying on her back, and place her legs raised up, and those [the midwife or surgeon] should sit beside her, and complete its members.
E aprop prem sobre le ventre de lu petit a petit, e aprop extratz aquo que es dejos les pes de lu de las aurelhas entro que sia preparada en la partida pus dejos.	And then press gently on the belly of the child little by little, and then extract what is behind the thighs to just before the part that is near the buttocks.
E si le fet no es fora-getat, lahoras pren les pes de lu e mau aquels am movement vehement, e aprop prem aquo que es sobre les ypocondres petit a petit entro que le fet puege a las partidas desus.	And if the fetus does not come out, then take hold of its legs and move them with force, and then press gently on what is above the hypochondria little by little until the fetus can reach the upper parts.
E aprop entrometa las suas mas e engualhe le fet petit a petit, e comanda a la femna que se exprema entro que le fet sia foro-getat.	And then insert its parts and engage the fetus little by little, and command the woman to exert herself until the fetus is completely delivered.
Eyssiment del fet latutidinalment pendent una de las suas mas.	 Deliver the fetus laterally with one of its parts.
Sia engeniat en reduccio de la ma de lu, mays si no podes aquela reduzir, lahoras eleva la femna e fe aquela anar.	 Attempt to reduce the hand of the fetus, but if you cannot reduce it, then elevate the woman and allow that to pass.
E si anar no pot, lahoras fay la jazer sobre le lieyt, e concuteys las coyssas de lu am concussio vehement, e aprop aministra liamentz les quals yeu e recomtatz de mucillages.	And if it cannot pass, then make her lie on her side, and strike the parts of the fetus with vigorous percussion, and then administer liniments which I use and recommend for soothing.
E si es vengut le enfantament, lahoras fay aquela sezer sobre cezelha, e aprop studia sobre la reduccio de la ma, e enguala le fet segon figura natural, e fay stornudar la femna e comanda a lu que comprema a si entro que sia foro-getat.	And if the childbirth has begun, then make her sit on a chair, and then study the reduction of the hand, and engage the fetus according to its natural position, and make the woman sneeze and command it [the fetus] to exert itself until it is completely delivered.
Eyssiment del fet sobre·l col expandudas las suas mas e la fassia de lu es al dos de la sua mayre.	 Deliver the fetus over the back with its parts and the fetal membrane at the side of its larger part.
Cove que la matrona tengua la ma del fet e aprop revolva aquel petit a petit, e eque aquel am facilitat.	Let the midwife hold the fetus and gradually turn it little by little, and let that part be facilitated.
E cum es e quant so es engualhat, e lahoras pausa sobre le conh de lu aquo que havem recomtat de oli e de mucellages.	And when it is and how long it is soaked, then pause on the cooling of what we have recommended of oil and mucilage.
E aprop comandas a lu que·s maugua petit a petit, e quan auras feyt aquo, lahoras fay aquela cezer sobre una cezelha e comanda li que sia inclinada sobre le latz dreyt, e aprop comanda a lu que sia compremuda; e fay aquela stornudar am condizi.	And then command him to squeeze it little by little, and when you have done this, now place that poultice on a cloth and command him to lean over the right side, and then command him to be restrained; and make him sneeze under certain conditions.
Exitus foetus praeparati super latus.	The exit of the prepared fetus on the side.
Quan deyssen a horrifici de la mayre segon aquesta manieyra, considera, e lahoras tu inscideys la segondina am la tua ungla entro que sia evacuada de la humiditat.	When you begin the incision of the mother according to this method, consider it, and then you make the second cut with your fingernail so that it is evacuated of the humidity.
E si le fet es suspendut sobre la cara e·l col de lu, lahoras tu inscideys aquela del embelic, per so que no sia retengut e mora.	And if the fetus is suspended over the face and neck of the mother, then you make an incision at the abdomen, so that it is not restrained and dies.
E aprop empelleys le fet a las partidas dedintz entro que pauses aquel segon que cove, e manda a la femna que comprema a si alcunas veguadas, e el sira fora-getat am eyssiment leugier, si Dieus o vol.	And then push the fetus towards the internal parts until you pause at the second necessary point, and tell the woman to restrain herself for several times, and the issue will be expelled quickly if God so wills.
Exitus geminorum aut foetuum multorum.	The exit of twins or multiple fetuses.
Sapias que gemels motas veguadas so natz, e alcunas vetz naysso tres o quatre , mays aquo es estranh e tart s’endeve; mays v so causas foro natura, e no vivo.	Know that twins usually are born in separate births, but sometimes three or four may be born at once, though this is rare and uncommon; however, in some cases it is due to causes outside of nature, and not living.
E conte aquelas, ja sia que sian montiplicatz, una segondina, e son seperatz per ciphac, distingen aquels enter le liguament en l’ombilic de cascun de aquels E alcunas veguadas so foro-getatz ayssi cum es un fet per eyssiment natural leugier, e so eysitz alcunas veguadas per eyssiment no-lausabla ayssi cum havem recomtat.	And with these, whether they are multiple, make a second incision, and separate them by the cord, distinguish each one through the ligament at the navel of each. Sometimes they are expelled as one fetus would be in a natural quick manner, but sometimes they are expelled separately in an uncommendable way as we have mentioned.
E si son dificils alcus de lor deves le enfantament e perveno ad aquo que havem dit de las figuras no-naturals, lahoras tu cura aquels ayssi cum havem recontat.	And if any of them are difficult for the woman in childbirth and you come to those which we have said about the unnatural figures, then treat them as we have recounted.
E si’ la matrona subtil e fassa aquo que fa am facilitat e subtilitat, e am tarditat, e sia ingeniat segon tota figura segon que es a lu preparat de l’engen amenant a salut.	And if the midwife is skilled and does what she should with ease and skill, and with delay when necessary, and acts according to every figure as it is prepared by the birth-giver for health.
Rememoratio eius quod formatur in matrice ex embrionibus et Abortiuntur.	A remembrance of what is formed in the womb from embryos and miscarriages.
Alcunas veguadas son formatz en la mayre un, e dos, e tres, e quatre, e v, e vi, e vii, e mays x, e ja es deves mi verificat que una femna abortem ne getet vi, e una autra x totz formatz, la qual causa fo fayta per mensuracio dels glorios savis.	Sometimes formations occur in the womb one, two, three, four, five, six, seven, and sometimes more than ten, and you should now be convinced that a woman may miscarry at six months, and another at all formations, which cause was made by measurement of the glorious wise ones.
E tot aysso cove que sia en la sciencia de la matrona quar fort leu ad aquela parve semblant de aquo, e donc opause se ad aquo am so que cove.	And all of this must be known by the midwife because it is easy to mistake one thing for another, and therefore she should know what needs to be done.
Capitol .lxxvi.	Chapter LXXVI.
De extraccio del fet quan es mort.	On the extraction of the fetus when it is dead.
Quan tu curas le fet mort am aquo que havem dit en la divisio de la medicacio e no es defora eyssit, e tu yest forsat usar de opperacio am ma, lahoras cove que consideras si la femna es de sana vertut e no es am alcu dels accidentz per les quals sobre ela es temuda perdicio.	When you treat the dead fetus as we have said in the division of treatment and it is not successful, and you are forced to use surgery, then it is necessary for you to consider whether the woman is of sound constitution and is not subject to any of those accidents by which danger to her is feared.
Lahoras cove que la femna sia envessada sobre le lieyt sobre le sieu dos, e sia le cap de lu enclinat enjos e las coyssas de lu sian elevadas.	Now it is necessary for the woman to be placed on her back on the bed with her buttocks raised and her head slightly lowered.
E·l ministre tengua aquela de doas partz o sia liada en le lieyt per so que·l cos de lu no se extenda deves la extraccio del fet.	The minister should use a knife with two edges or tie it down firmly on the table so that the body does not move during the extraction.
E aprop tu humecta la boca de la mayre de lu am olis humitz e am mucellage de altea e de fenugrec e de semensa de li.	And then moisten the mother's mouth with olive oil and honey, as well as mallow, fenugreek, and linseed.
E aprop unte la matrona la sua ma am aquels olis e mucellages, e aprop entrometa la sua ma am fecilitat en la mayre, e aprop cerque am la ma loc en le qual fique les uncis en le fet.	And then the midwife anoints her hand with those oils and mallows, and then inserts it gently into the mother, and then searches with her hand for the location of the fetus.
E locs convenient en aquo: adonc tu considera si le fet es preparat que deysenda sobre le sieu cap, e lahoras tu fique les uncis en les huels de lu, o en le col, o en la boca, o en le palat, o dejos la barba, o en la furcula de lu, o en les locs propdas de las costas, o dejos les ypocondres.	And in these cases: then you consider whether the fetus is positioned to descend head first, and if so, place the hooks in its hands, or around its neck, or in its mouth, or on its palate, or under its chin, or at its clavicle, or near the ribs, or under the armpits.
Mays si le deysendiment es sobre les pes de lu, lahoras en le pentenilh, o en le mieg de las costas.	But if the descent is foot first, then place the hooks in the heels, or in the middle of the back.
E cove que tengua le unci am la ma dreyta, e pausa la curvitat de lu en aquel loc le qual es entre les ditz de la ma senestra, e entrometa la ma am facilitat e fique le unci en alcu de aquels locs les quals havem ditz, entro que pervengua a la causa boyda.	And it is necessary to hold the hook with the right hand, and place the curvature of it where the fingers of the left hand are, and insert the hand gently into the mother and place the hook in one of those places we have mentioned, until it reaches the obstruction.
E aprop pause e fique en la apposicio de lu un autre unci, o le tertz si es necessitat, per so que sia atraccio engual, e no sia extencio segon la sua rectetut tant solament.	And then hold and place another hook in position, or a third if necessary, so that there is an equal pull, and not just extension according to its straightness alone.
Ans sia maugut a tota partida, per so que l’eyssiment de lu sia alleujat ayssi cum es fayt en dent deves la eradicacio de lu.	And it should be moistened at all times, so that the extraction of it is eased just as it is done during the removal of a tooth.
E cove en lu aquo que es entre lor que la extencio sia mollificada; e si alcuna partida de lu es retenguda, lahoras cove que la matrona unte alcus sieus ditz am oli e entrometa aquels espertament e revolva am aquels aquo que es retengut.	Place in the liquid that is between them so that the extension may be softened; and if any part of it is retained, then place that the midwife anoints some of her said hands with oil and interposes those skillfully and rolls back what is retained.
Donc si la partida del fet es fora-getada, lahoras les uncis sian permudatz entra loc le qual sia pus aut; e fay aysso entro que tot le fet sia fora-getat.	If the part of the fetus is presented incorrectly, then place the hooks between the places where it is more appropriate; and do this so that all of the fetus may be properly delivered.
Mays si la ma es eyssida denant l’autra, e no es possible reduzir aquela per la coartacio de lu, lahoras cove que drap sia envolopat sobre aquela; e aprop extratz aquela entro que tota sia fora-getada, e inscideys aquela o en la junctura de la ma o en le coyde.	But if one hand is presented before the other, and it is not possible to reduce that one by compression of it, then place a cloth wrapped around that one; and immediately extract that one so that all of it may be delivered, and incise it either at the joint of the hand or at the elbow.
E ayssi cove que fassas en l’autra ma e en les dos pes.	And do the same with the other hand and both feet.
Mays si le cap del fet es gran, o accideys a lu coartacio en le eyssiment, o es en le cap de lu aygua ajustada, lahoras cove que entrometa entre les ditz espatum spinos e fenda le cap e extragua la aygua, o que discroba aquel am un instrument le qual es nompnat “alundat”, la forma del qual vindra am las formas dels autres instruments en le capitol le qual es aprop aquest.	But if the head of the fetus is large, or compression occurs during its presentation, or it is in the tight fitting part of the water, then place between the said protruding spines and cut open the head to extract the water, or use an instrument called “alundat,” the form of which will be among the forms of other instruments in the chapter that follows this one.
E semblantment fassa si·l fet es de gran cap per natura: e lahoras cove que inscida aquel am algematu, o que prengua aquel am alunda ayssi cum havem dit; e aprop extra les osses am les forceps.	And similarly do if the fetus has a large head by nature: then it is necessary to incise that with some instrument, or take that as we have said using an alundat; and immediately extract the bones with forceps.
E si le cap es eyssit e es coartat deves la furcula, lahoras sia fendut entro que la humiditat la qual es en le pietz sia efunduda.	And if the head is presented and is compressed behind the clavicle, then it should be cut open so that the moisture which is in the cheeks may be effused.
Mays si no es complicat, ni obezeys a eyssiment, lahoras tu inscideys le cap tantost segon que a tu sira possible.	If it is not complicated and you do not wait too long, then cut into the head as soon as it is convenient for you.
E si le dejos del ventre es apostemat o es en lu ydropici, lahoras cove que tu perfores aquel entro que corro la humiditat que es en lu.	And if the flanks of the abdomen are full of pus or are in a state of hydrops, then it is necessary for you to puncture that part which runs with the moisture that is there.
Mays si le fet es sobre les sieus pes, lahoras la atraccio de lu es leugiera e la direccio de lu a la boca de la mayre es leugiera.	But if the fault is on the lesser vessels, then the attraction of it is weak and the direction of it towards the mouth of the artery is weak.
Mays si es coartat deves le ventre e·l pietz, lahoras cove que tu extraguas aquel am drap le qual auras envolopat sobre la tua ma, e que fendes le ventre e·l pietz entro que corra aquo que es en aquels.	But if it is constricted in the abdomen and the thighs, then you must remove that piece of cloth with which you have wrapped around your hand, and cut into the abdomen and the thighs where the fluid runs.
Mays si les autres membres so ostatz e torna le cap, lahoras la metrona entrometa la ma senestra; mays si la boca de la mayre es huberta, lahoras intrometa la ma en le preon de layre, e cerque am aquela le cap, e atira aquel am les ditz entro a la boca de la mayre, e aprop entrometa en lu un unci, o dos uncis, e atire lu am aquels.	But if the other members are stiff and turn the head, then insert your left hand; but if the mouth of the artery is open, then insert your hand into the chest, and search for the head, and pull it along with those mentioned to the mouth of the artery, and then insert about one or two inches, and pull it along with them.
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada per apostema caut le qual accideys a l’u, lahoras cove que no sia trebelhat sobre lu; abantz cove lahoras aministrar efusio de causas humidas grassas.	And if the mouth of the artery is constricted by pus that has occurred due to illness, then it must not be compressed upon it; instead, you should administer an effusion of moist and fatty substances.
E aministre emplastres; e segua le pacient en ayguas que mollifican e humectan.	And apply plasters; and follow with waters that soften and moisten.
E si le fet es sobre le sieu costat, lahoras si possible es, sia agulat: e sia aministrat aquo que havem dit en le fet viu.	And if the fault is on the side vessel, then if possible, it should be punctured; and what we have said about the living condition should be administered.
E si aquo no es possible, lahoras sia inscidit en pessas, e sia extrayt.	And if it cannot be done thus, then cut it into pieces and extract it.
E cove que non layssas alcuna causa dedintz de la segondina.	And do not leave any cause for the second [operation].
E cum tu auras complida tota la tua opperacio, lahoras aministra aquo que havem dit de la curacio en les apostemas cautz les quals accideysso de la mayre.	And when you have completed the entire operation, now administer what we have said about the treatment after abscesses, of which there has been mention regarding the major ones.
E si accideys flux de sanc, lahoras deyssendas en ayguas stipticas e aministra l’autra curacio.	And if bleeding occurs, then apply styptic waters and administer the other treatment.
E yeu ja e vist una femna en le ventre de la qual era fet mort, e aprop sobre aquel foc autra veguada emprenhada, e aprop foc mort es le fet autre.	And I have seen a woman in whose womb was a dead fetus, and next to it she was pregnant again, and beside the dead fetus another conception had taken place.
Accidit al u aprop lonc temps apostema en le sieu embelic; e inflat es entro que foc ubert, e comensec a getar brac.	It happened to one who had an abscess in the navel area for a long time; it became swollen inside with a pus-filled focus, and began to discharge pus.
E yeu fu appelhat a la cura de lu, e medicat a lu per lonc temps, e la plagua no es consolidada.	And I was called to treat him, and treated him for a long time, but the condition did not improve.
Adonc yeu pausegui sobre lu de alscunas causas emplastra de forta atraccio, e eyssic de lu un os, e aprop passero alcus jorns, e eyssic un autre os; e yeu fu trop meravilhat, cum en le ventre no sia os.	Then I decided to apply some causes of strong attraction to him and extracted one bone from him, and after a few days, another bone was passed; and I was very surprised, as there were no bones in the abdomen.
E adonc yeu cogitegui que eran dels osses del fet mort.	And then I realized that they were from the bones of the dead fetus.
Donc yeu enguisigui la plagua, e extrayssi de lu motz osses , la femna existent en las sieuas milhos disposicios, e ja visquec en tal manieyra per lonc temps, correc de lu un petit de brac.	Then I examined the condition thoroughly and extracted several bones from her, which were located in various parts of her body. And in this manner over a long period, she expelled a small amount of pus.
E yeu no afermegui asso esser stranh, sino quar en aquo es sciensa e ajutori ad aquo que le metge artifec am la ma per curacio aministra.	This is not to be considered strange, but because in this there is science and assistance for what the surgeon does with his hand in administering treatment.
De las formas dels instrumentz que so necessaris a extrayre le fet.	Of the forms of the instruments that are necessary to extract the fetus.
Forma de vertitge am la qual es uberta la mayre:	Form of a spiral used by the mother:
Aquesta es la forma de strenhedor en le qual so engualhatz les libres, al qual engualhament sian dos virtitges en doas extremitatz de dos futz.	This is the form of a clamp with which the leaves are held equally, at the clamping point there are two spirals at the ends of two arms.
May empero aquesta virtitge cove que sia pus subtil de strictori, e sia fayt o de eba o de fust de boys.	However, this spiral should be finer than the string, and it should be made of reed or wood.
E sia la latitut de quascun fust quays dos ditz e le marge de quascu amdos quays un dit, e la longitut de quascu es un palm e mig; e en le mieg loc de dos fustz so dos ajustaments de aquel meteys fustz les quals ja son fermatz, dels quals la longitut es la maytat de un palm e un pauc mes, e la latitut de quascu es quay dos ditz, o un pauc mes.	And the width of each arm should be two fingers, and the margin on each side should be one finger, and the length of each should be a palm and a half; and in the middle between the two arms there are two adjustments made from the same material as the arms, which are already fixed, their length being about half a palm more or less, and the width of each is two fingers, or slightly more.
E aquestz dos additamentz sian entromeses en la boca de la mayre per que sia uberta am aquels quan tu revolves las doas prescriptas virtigges.	And these two attachments should be inserted into the mother's mouth so that they are held when you turn the two prescribed spirals.
Forma autra semblant de aquela pus subtil e pus leugiera:	Another similar form, finer and more slender:
Sia fayta de fustz de eba o de boys segon la semblansa de forceps.	It should be made of reed or wood, resembling the form of forceps.
Mays empero en la extremitat de lu so dos additament ayssi cum vezes, e la longitut de aquels additament es quays un palm, e la latitut de quascu es dos ditz.	However, at the end of each of these two attachments, as you see, the length of those attachments is one palm, and the width of each is two fingers.
E cum tu vols am aquels ubrir la mayre, lahoras tu fay cezer la femna sobre le lieyt les pes pendentz, ubert aquo que es entre las coyssas de lu.	And when you want to open one of them, then at that time you should cut the woman on her bed with her knees raised, exposing what is between her thighs.
E aprop obre la tua ma am le instrument ayssi cum fas am forfexs engualment segon la quantitat que vols de la aprecio de la boca de la mayre entro que la metrona fassa so que vols.	And then open your hand with the instrument as you would with scissors, equally according to the quantity that you want of the width of the mouth of the wound until the speculum does what you want.
La forma de vertitge la qual diysero les antics:	The method of turning, which the ancients called:
Forma de impellent am le qual es empellit le fet:	Method of pushing with which the action is pushed forward:
Forma de amisidat2 am le qual es conterit le cap gran	Method of association with which the head is contained:
E es asemblat a forceps al qual so dentz en la extremitat, ayssi cum vezes, e alcunas veguadas es fayt lonc ayssi cum forceps segon aquesta forma, ayssi cum vezes, al qual so dentz ayssi cum dentz de ressegua am le qual es inscidit e conterit.	And it is similar to forceps, at the ends of which there are teeth, as you see. And sometimes it is made long like forceps according to this form, as you see, with teeth like those of a reed, with which it is incised and contained.
Forma de amesidat pauc:	Method of association for few:
Forma de unci havent una spina:	Form of a hook having a spine:
Forma de unci havent doas spinas:	Form of a hook having two spines:
Forma de forceps a la qual so dentz de cerra am le qual le cap del fet sia conterit:	Method of forceps with which the teeth close to contain the head of the fetus:
Forma de spatum havent dos extremitatz am le qual le cap es abscindit:	Form of a speculum having two ends with which the head is engaged:
Forma de dos espatums latz:	Form of two broad specula:
Totz aquels instrumentz so excersitatz, e quan mes so multiplicadas las specias de aquel e so preparadas deves le artifexs, quant es pus leugier a la sua opperacio e pus aut deves les homes per la sua quantitat.	All those instruments are exercised, and when more varieties of them are multiplied and prepared by the artisans, it is easier for their operation and better for people according to their needs.
E no obres de aquels instrumentz ja sia qua sia deves tu aparalhat, quar la necessitat de aquels no es excusabla.	You should prepare those instruments which are necessary, for the need of them cannot be avoided.
De extraccio de la segondina.	Of the extraction of the second [tooth].
Quan la segondina es retenguda deves le enfantament, lahoras cove que tu comandes a la malautae que retengua le sieu ale, e aprop fay aquela stornudar am condizi, e strenh la tua ma sobre la boca de lu e sobre las nars de lu, e si per aysso es defora eyssit, bo es.	When the afterbirth is retained after childbirth, you should instruct the patient to hold her breath, and then cause her to sneeze by certain means. Place your hand over the mouth and nose of the patient, and if this causes it to come out, that is good.
E sino, lahoras tu pren una ola e perfora en la cuberta un trauc e pausa en aquela erbas ubrent la boca de la mayre, ayssi cum calament e ruda e anet e camamilla e scicados arabic e cassia lignea e santaurea.	And if that does not work, take a cloth and pierce it with a hole, placing it over the mouth of the mother along with herbs such as wormwood, rue, chamomile, Arabian saffron, cinnamon, and sage.
Totas aquestas erbas o alcunas de lor sian submersas en aygua en la ola, e pausa aquela sobre le foc.	All these herbs or some of them should be immersed in water in the cloth, and place that over the fire.
E aprop pausa una canula de canaviera en la boca de la mayre, e tengua aquela entro que la evapor vengua a la concavitat de la mayre.	And then place a reed tube in the mouth of the mother, and hold it there until the vapor reaches the cavity of the mother.
E aprop fay aquela stornudar ayssi cum havem dit, e la segondina sira fora-getada am velocitat.	And then cause her to sneeze as we have said, and the afterbirth will be expelled quickly.
Mays si roman aprop aquesta curacio e no es eyssida, lahoras tu comanda a la matrona que submerge la sua ma sinistra en oli sizami o en micellage de altea, e aprop entrometa aquela en le conh e queresca am aquela la segondina, e cum aquela auras trobada, lahoras pren la e exten aquela pauc a pauc Mays si es annexsa en le preon de la mayre, lahoras entrometa la sua ma segon que havem recomtat, e quan aura trobat la segondina, extragua aquela petit a petit segon rectetut per so que la mayre no caja deves la atraccio vehement.	But if this treatment delays and it does not come out, then you command the midwife to immerse her left hand in sesame oil or masticate almonds, and then insert that into the womb and gently pull out the afterbirth with it. If it is attached to the placenta of the mother, then insert her right hand as we have recommended, and when she has found the afterbirth, gently extract it little by little so that the mother does not fall due to violent traction.
Abantz cove que sia permudada als costatz dreyt e sinestre am facilitat.	Take care that it is turned to the right and left with ease.
E aprop sia ajustat en la quantitat de atraccio, quar ela obedira e evasira de adhirencia.	And it should be adjusted in the amount of attraction, for it will obey and avoid adherence.
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada, nos ja havem recomtat la curacio am sturnutacio e am medicacio de la ola am erbas.	And if the mouth of the mother is obstructed, we have already recommended treatment through sneezing and medication of the wound with herbs.
Mays si no es fora-getada am totas las causas las quals havem recomtadas, lahoras guarda te que no fetigues sobre aquela en iteracio de abstracio, mays empero cove que aquo que es eyssit de lu a la boca de la mayre lies a la coyssa de la femna, e aprop cristeriza aquela am enguent e tetrafarmacon; quar aquel fara poyrir aquela aprop alcus dias e sira dissolvuda e sira fora-getada.	But if it is not expelled by all the causes we have recommended, then do not exhaust yourself in repeated attempts of abstraction. Instead, ensure that what has been ejected from the mouth of the mother lies close to the woman's body, and subsequently treat it with abortion and tetrapharmacon; for this will cause it to be purged after a few days and thus dissolved and expelled.
Mays quan se poyreys, es de lu elevada mala audor al cap, e al estomac, e aquo ledeys la malauta; e adonc cove que sian aministradas sub-fumiguacios e convenientz ad aquo.	But when it is purged, it rises to the head and to the stomach, causing illness; then it is necessary that sublimations and appropriate remedies be administered for this.
Mays alcus dels Antics ja so esproatz sub-fumigacio de nazitort e de figuas seccas.	But some of the Ancients already used sublimation of nitre and dried figs.
Forma de instrument am le qual la femna es sub-fumiguada deves la retentio de mestruas e de la segondina:	Form of the instrument with which a woman is subjected to sublimation due to the retention of menstruation and the second condition:
Sia fayta de veyre o de eram.	It should be made of wood or ivory.
E sia pausada la extremitat subtil en le conh e la extremitat ampla sobre le foc, e la sub-fumiguacio sia pausada sobre las brazas del foc.	And the fine end should be placed in the vagina and the wider end above the fire, and the sublimation should be placed on the embers of the fire.
E tengua aquela entro que sia consumida aquela sub-fumiguacio e itera·n autra.	And keep that instrument inside until the sublimation is consumed, then repeat with another.
De curacio del cul del enfant no-perforat.	Of the treatment of the child's uncircumcised penis.
Motz enfantz naysso e les culs de lu no so perforatz, les quals ya ciphac subtil e opilat.	Many children are born and their penises are not circumcised, which must then be carefully opened and covered.
Adonc cove a la matrona que perfore am le sieu dit aquel ciphac; e sino, perfora aquel am spatum agut, e guarda se que no toque le lacert.	Then it should be the midwife who pierces with her finger that foreskin; and if not, pierce it with a sharp scalpel, being careful not to cut the glans.
E aprop pause sobre aquel lana enfusa en vi e oli; e aprop cura aquel am enguent entro que sia senat.	And then apply a poultice made of lint soaked in wine and oil; and afterwards, treat it with a dressing until it is healed.
Mays si temes que sia opilat, lahoras pausa en le trauc una canula per motz dias, e osta la quan le enfant voldra degerir.	But if you fear that it is obstructed, then insert a cannula for several days, and remove it when the child needs to urinate.
E ja accideys oppilacio del cul per consolidacio de plagua o de apostema; adonc cove que aquela consolidacio sia inscidida, e aprop sia curada am aquo que avem dit de la curacio e del plom.	And if there is an obstruction of the penis due to the hardening of a wound or abscess; then it should be that this hardening be incised, and afterwards it should be treated as we have said regarding treatment and lead.
De curacio de las fistulas que endeveno dejos.	Of the treatment of fistulas that occur below.
Las fistulas que endeveno en la partida dejos pus bassa so nodacio e grossetut las quals endeveno prop del cul defora o en l’espazi de la una partida.	Fistulas that occur in the lower region close to the body or near the buttocks or in the area between them are usually hard and thick.
E es una fistula o motas.	And it is one fistula or multiple.
E cum aquela nodacio es antiquada e corr de la humiditat aygosa blanca o poyridura subtil, e alcunas veguadas so de aquestas fistulas alcunas penetrantz.	And as this hardness subsides and it discharges watery or slightly purulent white moisture, and sometimes these fistulas penetrate deeper.
E aquelas penetrantz so conogudas per aquo que es eyssit de aquelas per la egressio e per ventosetat; e alcunas vetz use le malaute de egressio, e fort leu es eyssit de aquelas verm.	And these penetrating ones are known by what is emitted from them through discharge and swelling; and sometimes the severity of the discharge indicates that they are very deep.
E so de aquelas fistulas alcunas veguadas en l’espazi penetrantz entro a la vesica, e entro al meat de la vergua; e so de aquelas penetrantz entro la junctura de la coyssa e entro al notz de la coeta.	Of those fistulas, some extend into the space penetrating into the bladder, and into the shaft of the penis; and some penetrate into the joint of the thigh and into the root of the bone.
E aquo en que es conoguda fistula penetrant entro al cul e no-penetrant, es que tu metas le tieu dit endic en le cul, e entrometas tenta subtil de eram o de ferr en la fistula quan no y es turtuositat.	And in the one where it is known as a penetrating fistula into the anus and a non-penetrating fistula, you should insert your finger into the anus, and insert a fine probe of hair or iron into the fistula when there is no tortuosity.
Mays si en aquela es turtuositat, lahoras entromet en aquela tenta subtil de plom o de pels de caval entro que tu sentas la tenta o le pel en le tieu dit.	But if there is tortuosity in that one, then insert the fine probe of lead or horsehair into it until you feel the probe or hair with your finger.
E si no sentas aquela de tot ni no procezeys del trauc alcuna causa de egestio ni verm ni ventositat, ayssi cum havem dit, lahoras sapias que es no-penetrant, e lahoras coyta te a la curacio.	And if you do not feel anything of that and there is no process from the tract of any cause of evacuation or worms or gas, as we have said, then you know it is non-penetrating, and then proceed with the treatment.
E quan la fistula es penetrant entro a la vesica o entro al meat de la vergua, lahoras la significacio de lu es eyssiment de urina de aquela e prohibicio de lu ad aysso que·l loc am medicina sia consolidat.	And when the fistula is penetrating into the bladder or into the shaft of the penis, then the significance of that is that urine will come from there, and it prohibits this so that the place may be consolidated by medicine.
Mays si es penetrant entro la junctura de la coyssa o entro al os e envencio de dolor en le circuit, lahoras senhal de lu es que la tenta perve entro aqui si en lu no es turtuositat entro al os, e envencio de dolor en le circuit de la partida; e que de lu yeys poyredura tostemps; e que no val en aquela medicacio, ni es consolidada am enguent.	But if it is penetrating into the joint of the thigh or into the bone and causes pain in the circumference, then the sign of that is that the probe goes through there if there is no tortuosity within the bone, and causes pain in the circumference of the affected area; and you will have a persistent discharge from there; and that does not respond to medication, nor is it consolidated without treatment.
E en totas aquelas fistulas penetrant no es curacio de tot, e la curacio de aquelas es trebalh e vanetat dels folyls metges sobre·l qual so fermatz.	And in all those penetrating fistulas, there is no complete cure, and the treatment for these is the labor and persistence of skilled physicians, upon which depends their success.
Mays en aquela que no es penetrant e no antiqua, sanacio am ferr es sperada segon que yeu a tu recomtare, e aquo que ja yeu e proat.	In that which is not penetrating and not ancient, healing by iron is hoped for as I will tell you, and this that I say is good.
E es que le malaute jagua entre las tuas mas sobre le sieu dos e eleva las cambas de lu entro sus, las coyssas sian enclinadas al ventre de lu, e aprop entromet tenta de plom, o de eram si es en la fistula turtuositat, entro que sapias le loc on perve la tenta.	And it is that the patient should lie between your thighs with their back upwards and lift the flanks up, so that the contents are inclined towards the abdomen, and then insert a probe of lead or iron if there is tortuosity in the fistula, until you know where the probe passes.
E si aquela sent le malaute entorn le cuol, lahora cove que tu entrometas le tieu dit endic en le cuol.	And if the pain is around the anus, then you should insert your finger into the anus at that time.
E si sentas en le tieu dit la tenta ja per si meteyssa descuberta penetrar, otra aquo que sentas entre le tieu dit e aquela siphac o carn, lahoras sapias certanament que aquela es penetrant; e adonc no trebalhes en aquela, quar no es en aquela sanacio, ayssi cum havem dit.	And if you feel with your finger that the probe can easily penetrate, or what you feel between your finger and that sinus or flesh, then you know certainly that it is penetrating; and then do not work on that one, for there is no healing in that one, as we have said.
Mays empero diyssero alcus que es sana en alcus homes tart.	But some might say that it heals in some men slowly.
E de la medicacio per la qual es sperat juvament en lu es que tu ignes cauteri subtil segon le ample de la fistula, ayssi cum es precedit, e intrometas aquel ignit en la fistula entro que pervengua entorn le cuol; e aprop itera aquel doas o tres vetz entro que sapias que ja son adhustas totas aquelas carns ajustadas fistuladas que so semblantz a cana de pluma de ausel.	And for the treatment by which healing is hoped for involves you igniting a cautery subtly according to the size of the fistula, as has been described, and inserting that heated instrument into the fistula until it goes around the anus; and then repeat this two or three times until you know that all those inflamed tissues surrounding the fistula are tightened, so that they resemble the quill of a bird.
E aprop cura aquela am calguas envolopadas en boder entro que en yescan totas aquelas carns que so adhustas, e aprop cura aquela am medicinas la carn engendrantz e consolidantz, e si es sanada, bo es; e sino, lahoras no es sana en degun temps per autra curacio.	And then treat that with bandages wrapped in boiled cloth until all those tightened tissues grow and consolidate, and then treat it with medicines that promote tissue growth and consolidation. If it heals, good; but if not, then it will not heal at any time by other treatment.
